line.text: Accuse me thus that I have scanted all

line.text: Wherein I should your great deserts repay

line.text: Forgot upon your dearest love to call

line.text: Whereto all bonds do tie me day by day

line.text: That I have frequent been with unknown minds

line.text: And given to time your own dear-purchased right
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That I have hoisted sail to all the winds

line.text: Which should transport me farthest from your sight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Book both my wilfulness and errors down

line.text: And on just proof surmise accumulate
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Bring me within the level of your frown
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But shoot not at me in your wakened hate
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Since my appeal says I did strive to prove
